actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A resolution urging that the Senate adopt a provision for the one-time exclusion from income of $100,000 of gain from the sale of a principal residence.

summary.text: Declares that the House of Representatives urges the Senate to adopt a similar provision to section 405 of H.R. 13511 (one-time tax exclusion from income of gain from the sale of a principal residence).

titles.title: A resolution urging that the Senate adopt a provision for the one-time exclusion from income of $100,000 of gain from the sale of a principal residence.
